meanings.definition: A region considered with reference to its climate.
meanings.sent1: The tropical clime is known for its warm weather.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy vacationing in sunny climes.
meanings.sent3: In the icy clime, penguins wear tuxedos to stay warm.
meanings.sent4: She longed for the familiar clime of her hometown.
meanings.sent5: The desert clime was so hot that even the cacti were sweating.

meanings.sent1: The arid clime of the desert makes it a challenging place to live.
meanings.sent2: Different climes around the world offer unique experiences.
meanings.sent3: In the rainy clime, umbrellas are a must-have accessory.
meanings.sent4: His heart longed for the peaceful clime of the countryside.
meanings.sent5: The mountain clime was so refreshing, it felt like a breath of fresh air.
